recipes.title: Healthy Chocolate Banana Bites
recipes.description: Easy 15-minute healthy chocolate banana bites with only 5 ingredients. No-bake, vegan, and gluten-free dessert perfect for satisfying your sweet cravings guilt-free!

instructions.text: In a medium bowl, mash the ripe bananas until smooth.
Add almond butter and mix until well combined.
Stir in cocoa powder and maple syrup until the mixture is smooth and chocolatey.
Fold in the mini chocolate chips gently.
Using a small cookie scoop or spoon, form mixture into 12 bite-sized balls and place on a parchment-lined tray.
Refrigerate for 10-15 minutes to firm up. Serve chilled and enjoy!

notes: Store in the refrigerator for up to 5 days in an airtight container.
For a nut-free version, substitute sunflower seed butter for almond butter.
You can roll the bites in shredded coconut or chopped nuts for extra texture.
These freeze well for up to 3 months - just thaw for 5 minutes before serving.
